metadata.name: Fantasy World Generator
metadata.author: World Builder
metadata.description: A comprehensive **fantasy world generator** for creating characters, locations, items, and story elements. Focuses on descriptive and cosmetic details for immersive worldbuilding.
metadata.instructions: Use the templates to generate complete descriptions, or roll individual tables for specific elements. Tables are organized by category and can be combined freely.

copyright.notice: Released to public domain under CC0. Use freely for any purpose.

entries.description: Adaptable and ambitious, humans are found in every corner of the world.
Ancient and graceful, elves possess an ethereal beauty and deep connection to magic.
Stout and steadfast, dwarves are master craftsmen with an unshakeable resolve.

Proud and powerful, orcs value strength, honor, and the bonds of clan.
Marked by infernal heritage, tieflings bear the burden of suspicion but possess fierce independence.

templates.name: Merchant Transaction
templates.description: Generates a purchase with math expressions for price calculation.
templates.pattern:
## Transaction Receipt

**Item:** {{treasureByRarity}}

**Base Price:** {{$basePrice}} gold
**Quantity:** {{$quantity}}
**Subtotal:** {{math:$basePrice * $quantity}} gold
**Haggle Roll:** {{$haggleDiscount}} ({{math:$haggleDiscount * 2}}% off if successful)
**Final Price:** {{math:($basePrice * $quantity) - (($basePrice * $quantity * $haggleDiscount) / 50)}} gold (with discount)
